title: Release Kindred already.
body: Jesus Christ, this game is so stale.

replies.body: Does anyone know how to contact rito? so that I can yell at them about how broken they made darius and how its almost been 3 weeks and kindred isn't out. I mean, come on you're going to reveal a champion in the school holidays, but not release them? If that's your marketing scheme then how the fuck is league of legends so big?
IKR, can we please get someone from Riot to confirm when Kindred will be released?

A week after the patch (they said so on the Q&A)

Honestly if it's not going to be released they shouldn't even tell us it's in the patch notes. There is bound to be another patch anyways before release, so why not just wait until then. This whole superficial hype build up crap is really getting on my nerves and each time this happens I am so glad to have a PBE account -_-

They are broken as fk tho. So broken Rito had to global nerf ranged devourer junglers just for them.

I'd rather enjoy the time before they actually become a thing.
Dont play it then cry baby.
